title: Spatio-Temporal Gap Analysis of OBIS-SEAMAP Project Data
summary: This article discusses a spatio-temporal gap analysis of OBIS-SEAMAP project data, which includes observations from various surveys. It highlights the importance of such analysis for prioritizing future surveys and filling knowledge gaps in datasets.
usefulness_reason: Score 70 assigned because the article directly mentions "Spatio-Temporal Gap Analysis" and "survey" in the context of analyzing datasets, aligning with the query's focus on Spatio Temporal and Survey data.
